type: Tutorial Step - Points to Take Home...

definition.text: There are some key learnings in the previous reading: multiple strategies, single positions, and precedence.

paragraphs.text: Let's take some mental notes for what comes next:
Multiple strategies may coexist within a trading system—as many as you wish.
One active strategy with one open position at any given moment is allowed only.
Precedence is given by the order in which strategies are defined around the Trading System node. You may change the order, of course!
You are probably asking why? Do these rules sound arbitrary? They are, for good reason!
